landingPage.title: Your personal radar for open-source projects
landingPage.subtitle: Find projects that match your skills, track your contributions, and build your developer profile in the open-source community.

learns.title: Learn about Open Source
learns.subtitle: Discover how to contribute to open source projects and expand your potential as a developer
learns.text2: Understand the basic concepts of the open source universe
learns.text3: Open source software is a type of software whose source code is made publicly available, allowing anyone to view, use, modify, and distribute the code as they see fit.
learns.text4: This collaborative approach enables developers from around the world to work together, share knowledge, and create better solutions through transparency and cooperation.
learns.text6: First steps to contribute to projects
learns.text7: Find a project that aligns with your interests and skills
learns.text8: Read the project's documentation and contribution guides
learns.text9: Explore issues tagged 'good first issue' or 'beginner friendly'
learns.text10: Fork the repository and clone it locally
learns.text11: Create a branch for your contribution
learns.text12: Develop your solution and test it
learns.text13: Submit a pull request with your changes
learns.text15: Why join the open source community?
learns.text17: Demonstrate your skills through real contributions
learns.text19: Connect with developers around the world
learns.text21: Learn coding practices from established projects
learns.text23: Gain recognition in the technical community
learns.text27: Be part of a community without borders
learns.text28: Contributing to open source projects is a way to overcome geographical barriers and connect with developers from all over the world. It is an opportunity to collaborate on meaningful projects and build international professional relationships.
learns.text29: Through this experience, you can expand your network, improve your English communication skills, and increase your chances of landing global remote work opportunities.
